## LineCaps type

Available line caps types(`"None"`<!-- -->, `"Round"`<!-- -->, `"Square"`<!-- -->, `"TriangleOut"`<!-- -->, `"TriangleIn"`<!-- -->). Default is `"Round"`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type LineCaps = "Square" | "Round" | "None" | "TriangleOut" | "TriangleIn";
```
